attributes.action: Make cycle helmets legal to all children under the age of 16 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We lost our son Daniel Felstead on 31/3/06 tragic in a hit and run  accident he died of severe head injuries
before we lost Daniel we was blind to the fact that cycle helmets save lives.And in Daiel"s case if he had been wearing one it could of saved his life.This is why we want the goverment to listen to family"s like ourselfs to make it ilegal to ride a cycle with out the proper safety precautions because there is no difference between a motorcycles who has to wear a helmet and a cyclist who does not.
